text:
@NYGovCuomo https://t.co/BSfxyMhlap Cytodyn continues to treat critically ill patients at ONE NY hospital under FDA approved "Emergency" use protocol. Please Governor Cuomo lift this ban so other hospitals may offer it.
Life saving! #leronlimab
